ddogreen.name: DDOGreen
ddogreen.tagline: Smart Power Management That Just Works
ddogreen.intro: DDOGreen is an intelligent, production-ready power management tool that automatically switches your laptop between high-performance and power-saving modes based on actual system usage.
ddogreen.highlight: 20-30% longer battery life with zero performance compromise

features.title: Key Features
list: Automatic power mode switching based on CPU load
Smart hysteresis behavior (70% high performance, 30% power save)
Zero configuration required - works out of the box
Minimal resource usage and system impact
